query.queryinfo: SELECT [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity], [System.Title], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [MR.Requirement.ApplicativeProject], [System.NodeName], [UI.bug.keyword], [UI.Reserved], [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch], [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedBy], [System.CreatedDate], [System.ChangedDate] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = 'Task' AND ( [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'Task\SW\UIDeal_AWS' OR [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'Task\SW\MCSF1' ) AND [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' AND (( [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity] = 'Other' AND [System.Title] CONTAINS '[B69SP4自测1]' AND [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority] = 0 ) OR ( [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity] = 'Improvement' AND [UI.Reserved] CONTAINS '[B69SP4H3R3M]' )) AND [System.State] = 'Assigned' AND [System.NodeName] IN ('Heart', 'Liver Evaluation', 'Lung Nodule', 'Dual Energy Analysis', 'Dental Application', 'Colon Analysis', 'Body Perfusion', 'Bone Structure Analysis', 'Lung Density Analysis', 'Report', 'Review 4D', 'Dynamic Analysis_CT', 'Vessel Analysis_CT', 'Vessel Analysis_MR', 'Heart_Common', 'Vessel_Common', 'Vessel_Heart_Combined', 'FFR', 'Brain Perfusion_CT_3D', 'App2', 'AppCommon', 'AppCom') ORDER BY [System.State], [System.NodeName]

select [System.Id], [System.Title], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [System.AreaPath], [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch], [System.CreatedDate], [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate], [UI.bug.keyword], [UI.Reserved], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority], [MR.Requirement.ApplicativeProject], [System.NodeName] from WorkItems where [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' and ([System.State] = 'Assigned' or [System.State] = 'New') and ([System.AreaPath] under 'Task\SW\UIDeal_AWS' or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\MR\uMR\UIDeal_AWS' or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\CT\For HSW\UIDEAL' or [System.AreaPath] under 'Task\MI\SW\For HSW BU\UIDeal_AWS') and [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity] = 'Improvement' and (not [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] contains '[SWBU_69_SP4]' and not [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] contains '[SWBU_69SP4_R2]' and not [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] contains '[SWBU_69SP4_R1]' and not [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch] contains '[SWBU_71]') and [System.CreatedDate] >= '2020-01-01T00:00:00.0000000' and [MR.Requirement.ApplicativeProject] contains '[HSW-uWS-CT]' and (not [UI.bug.keyword] contains '[0812Review]' and not [UI.bug.keyword] contains '[1111Review]' and not [UI.bug.keyword] contains '[1130Review]' and not [UI.bug.keyword] contains '[1023Review]' and not [UI.Reserved] contains '[0812Review]' and not [UI.Reserved] contains '[1111Review]' and not [UI.Reserved] contains '[1130Review]') and (not [UI.bug.keyword] contains 'wish' and not [UI.Reserved] contains 'wish') and [System.NodeName] in ('Heart', 'Liver Evaluation', 'Lung Nodule', 'Dual Energy Analysis', 'Dental Application', 'Colon Analysis', 'Body Perfusion', 'Bone Structure Analysis', 'Lung Density Analysis', 'Report', 'Review 4D', 'Dynamic Analysis_CT', 'Vessel Analysis_CT', 'Vessel Analysis_MR', 'Heart_Common', 'Vessel_Common', 'Vessel_Heart_Combined', 'FFR', 'Brain Perfusion_CT_3D', 'App2', 'AppCommon', 'AppCom') order by [System.AreaPath]

SELECT [System.Id], [System.WorkItemType], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity], [System.Title], [System.AssignedTo], [System.State], [MR.Requirement.ApplicativeProject], [System.NodeName], [UI.bug.keyword], [UI.Reserved], [UI.Bug.ExpectFixedBranch], [UI.ExpectedSolvedDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedDate], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedBy], [System.CreatedDate], [System.ChangedDate] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = 'Task' AND ( [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'Task\SW\UIDeal_AWS' OR [System.AreaPath] UNDER 'Task\SW\MCSF1' ) AND [System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' AND (( [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity] = 'Other' AND [System.Title] CONTAINS '[B69SP4自测1]' AND [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority] = 0 ) OR ( [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Activity] = 'Improvement' AND [UI.Reserved] CONTAINS '[B69SP4H3R3M]' )) AND [System.State] IN ('Resolved', 'Verified', 'Closed') AND [System.NodeName] IN ('Heart', 'Liver Evaluation', 'Lung Nodule', 'Dual Energy Analysis', 'Dental Application', 'Colon Analysis', 'Body Perfusion', 'Bone Structure Analysis', 'Lung Density Analysis', 'Report', 'Review 4D', 'Dynamic Analysis_CT', 'Vessel Analysis_CT', 'Vessel Analysis_MR', 'Heart_Common', 'Vessel_Common', 'Vessel_Heart_Combined', 'FFR', 'Brain Perfusion_CT_3D', 'App2', 'AppCommon', 'AppCom') AND [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.ResolvedDate] >= @today ORDER BY [System.State], [System.NodeName]
